alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 1:31PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOWFALL WILL IMPACT THE SOUTHERN BIG HORN BASIN... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 30 to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 130 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Shell Falls to 8 miles south of Hamilton Dome and moving southeast at 25 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Upper Medicine Lodge Lake around 155 PM MST. Thermopolis and Hot Springs State Park around 205 PM MST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
